name: Elman España: Anarchy
storyline: In Elman España: Anarchy the player controls the character based on the Spanish model Elman España. Through twelve levels of 2D side-scrolling gameplay with three different map locations ruined post-apocalyptic versions of Texas, California and New York City are visited. In each stage, special ops enemies attack in hoards with different types of weapons from assault rifles to grenade launchers. The objective of the game is to destroy all enemies until you reach the final level, twelve boss. You get weapons upgrades such as pistols, AK-47s, grenades, etc.
